code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from"react";import{socket}from"../socket";import{uploadAvatar,updateAvatarOnServer,getAvatarFromServer}from"../avatar";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function VoicePanel(){const
